definitions.structures.abstr.mappings.impl

Class LinearMapping

  • java.lang.Object
    • definitions.structures.abstr.mappings.impl.LinearMapping
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XmlPrintable, Element, GroupHomomorphism, MonoidHomomorphism, VectorSpaceHomomorphism, VectorSpaceMapping, Vector, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FiniteDimensionalLinearMapping, Identity

    public abstract class LinearMapping
extends java.lang.Object
implements Element, VectorSpaceHomomorphism
    Linear Mapping: mapping between two vector spaces preserving addition and scalar multiplication.
    Author:
    ro
